Hi Lucy,

Confirming we have created redirects for the pages.

Hey Joel,

Can you remove the below from the menu now and set redirects for the current 'careers' (https://acoufelt.co.uk/careers/) and 'people' (https://acoufelt.co.uk/our-people/) page to the new Culture & Values page: https://acoufelt.co.uk/culture-and-values/

You can also redirect the 'global advisory board' page (https://acoufelt.co.uk/global-advisory-board/) to the new Acoustic Thought Leadership Council page: https://acoufelt.co.uk/acoustic-thought-leadership-council/



Please also direct the below 'Culture' link (https://acoufelt.co.uk/our-culture/) to the new Culture & Values page: https://acoufelt.co.uk/culture-and-values/



Thanks!

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

Level 43, 264 George Street, Sydney, NSW, 2000
acoufelt.com

Hi Katie,

Sure, we have updated the site.

  • Careers forms notification send requests to careers.uk@acoufelt.com
  • Company menu has been updated.
  • Career footer has been added as well.

Hi Joel, Fantastic! That looks great. Can I just confirm that the form at the bottom sends requests to careers.uk@acoufelt.com Can we then get the navigation set up the same as the AUS website:
  • 'Culture and values' under Company
  • 'Acoustic Thought Leadership Council' under Company
  • 'Careers' in the footer which just anchors to the open jobs section of the 'culture & values' page
Let me know if you need any further information. Thanks again! Warm regards, Katie Kenna Marketing Coordinator - EMEA T: +44 (0) 203 488 6322 We've moved! Level 1, 1 Old Street, London, EC1V 9HL, UK acoufelt.com

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,


Happy Friday!


Can we please replicate the new 'ATLC' page onto the UK website? https://acoufelt.com.au/acoustic-thought-leadership-council/


Can we also please do the same for the 'Culture and Values' page, but few changes below: https://acoufelt.com.au/culture-and-values/

  • Please remove the below initiatives:


  • Please remove this open role

  • And for the 'People' can you please swap out to the following (taken from the existing people page under 'EMEA': https://acoufelt.co.uk/our-people/)





Thanks so much!


Warm regards,
Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager
